bio:
I've been a Java developer for five years, and a PHP developer for seven. I work for Red Hat where I help lead the Seam community. I am also the lead of Seam Catch, a next generation Exception Handling framework extensible to meet all the needs of your application.

Besides Java my other programming interests include Groovy, Ruby and Gradle. I also enjoy a good book, a game of chess and live theatre. I have a wonderful wife, two daughters and two sons whom I love very much and feel very blessed to have in my life.
name: Jason Porter
